T02D2687:264b-19: dpung gnyen la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2687:264b-20: mdza' ba'i skye bo zhes pa ni ;
T02D2687:264b-22: yid btsugs pa la sogs pa byed pa'o //
T02D2687:264b-23: sdug ba'i skye bo phebs par smra ba la sogs
T02D2687:264b-24: pa ma yin gyi phan tshun gcig la gcig yid
T02D2687:264b-28: bdag nyid kyis nyes pa ci yang ma byas par /
T02D2687:264b-29: de gnyis bdag la sdang bar gyur pa yang gdon
T02D2687:264b-30: gyi byas par rig pa mchog gi rgyud las gsungs
T02D2687:264b-31: so // bran sogs zhes pa ni rang gi 'khor dang g-yog la sogs pa'o //
T02D2687:264b-32: gza' la sogs zhes pa ni //
T02D2687:264b-33: rang gi bu dang chung ma dang sogs pa'o //
T02D2687:264b-34: gtses pa dang zhes pa ni //
T02D2687:264b-35: de la de tshe gnod pa byed pa'o //
T02D2687:264b-36: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang /
T02D2687:264b-38: skye bo nang phan tshun gnod pa dang /
T02D2687:264b-40: rtsod pa ni gcig dang shags 'gyed pa'o //
T02D2687:264b-43: nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang /
T02D2687:264b-45: bdag nyid sngar phyug pa las /
T02D2687:264b-47: tshong byas kyang legs par mi 'ong ba dang /
T02D2687:264b-48: so nams byas kyang 'bras bu la sogs pa mang po'i mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D2687:264b-49: mya ngan las byung ba'i gnod pa zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2687:264b-50: dper na rgan mo cig gi bu gcig pa shi ste /
T02D2687:265a-2: dbyibs kyi rnam pa yid la byas shing /
T02D2687:265a-3: ngag tu bu zhes brjod pas /
T02D2687:265a-4: bu la sems zin nas bu shi ba'i gzugs mig sngar byung bas /
T02D2687:265a-5: nga'i bu khyer ba'i 'dre byung ngo zer ba'i log pa'i shes pa la brten nas /
T02D2687:265a-7: ngal ba las byung ba'i gnod pa dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2687:265a-8: bdag nyid kyi lus dang sems dub par gyur nas yid 'khrul nas /
T02D2687:265a-9: 'dre la sogs pas khyer ba yin nam snyam pa'i log pa'i shes pa la brten nas /
T02D2687:265a-10: gdon la sogs pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2687:265a-11: 'jigs pa dang ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2687:265a-12: sprul dang glang pa che'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa brgyad yod do //
T02D2687:265a-13: yang na dmyal ba'i 'jig rten mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-14: yi dags kyi 'jig rten mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-15: dud 'gro'i 'jig rten mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-16: gshin rje'i 'jig rten mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-17: bgrod dka' ba'i 'jig rten mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-18: skye ba'i 'jig pa mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-19: na ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2687:265a-21: phongs pa dang zhes pa ni //
T02D2687:265a-22: bdag nyid dang po nas dbul bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2687:265a-23: gza' dang zhes pa ni gza' chen po r'a hu la la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02D2687:265a-24: rgyu skar zhes pa ni smin drug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02D2687:265a-25: gza' skar ngan pa la na ba dang /
T02D2687:265a-27: skyes pa la sogs pa byung na /
T02D2687:265a-28: yang 'di'i cho ga byas na nges par zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2687:265a-29: byang stems dang zhes pa ni //
T02D2687:265a-30: 'khrul 'khor la sogs par bdag gi ming rus la sogs pa bcug pa'am /
T02D2687:265a-31: mi bzad gdon gyi zhes pa ni lha'i gdon la
T02D2687:265a-32: sogs pa gdon chen po bco brgyad las dge slong
T02D2687:265a-33: dang / rgyal po la 'dzin pa'i srin po'i gdon la sogs pa'i gdon chen po bzhi'o //
T02D2687:265a-37: mya ngan ngal nas byung ba yi //
T02D2687:265a-38: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
T02D2687:265a-40: gang gi rang gi rmi lam du byung ba ste /
T02D2687:265a-41: rmi ltas ngan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang byung yang 'di'i cho ga byas na bzlog go //
T02D2687:265b-0: sdig pa mthong na yang zhes pa bka' mi shis pa'i mtshan ma la sogs @265b pa mthong ba'o //
T02D2687:265b-1: de tsho gang byung yang bzlas brjod byas pas sgo nas /
T02D2687:265b-3: khrus kyi cho ga byas pas /
T02D2687:265b-4: de dag thams cad la grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2687:265b-5: des ni bsnyen sgrub gang gi don du bya ba'i gdul bya bstan to //
T02D2687:265b-6: da ni bsnyen pa'i dus na sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bstan te /
T02D2687:265b-8: sbyor ba'i cho ga sngon du bya ba dang /
T02D2687:265b-9: sgra la gnas pa'i sbam gtan dngos dang /
T02D2687:265b-10: de bya ba'i phan yon no //
T02D2687:265b-12: de ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2687:265b-14: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2687:265b-15: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2687:265b-16: bya ba'i tshig rkang gsum gyis so /
T02D2687:265b-17: mdo sde dam pa mnyam par bya //
T02D2687:265b-18: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba /
T02D2687:265b-19: mdo sde'i 'di ni byan byed na //
T02D2687:265b-20: zhes pa'i tshig rkang gsum gyi ni dngos gzhi bstan to //
T02D2687:265b-21: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2687:265b-23: sdig ba kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2687:265b-24: zhes pa'i tshig rkang bdun gyi phan yon bstan to //
T02D2687:265b-26: de yang su siddhi ka ra las //
T02D2687:265b-27: lus dang ngag gi gtsang sbra dang /
T02D2687:265b-28: gsum pa yid kyi gtsang sbra ste //
T02D2687:265b-29: bzhi pa bden par smra ba'o //
T02D2687:265b-30: lnga pa phyi yi gtsang sbrar bshad //
T02D2687:265b-32: des ni zhes pas ni sgrub pa po bstan to ;
T02D2687:265b-38: mi gtsang ba dag pa'i gnas skabs so //
T02D2687:265b-40: dag par byas nas sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya ba'i don to //
T02D2687:265b-42: cho ga yan lag drug gis lha bskyed pa'i sngon du yang /
T02D2687:265b-43: khrus dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2687:265b-44: gang dag yid dge zhes pa ni yid ches pa'i dad pas kun nas bslangs nas /
T02D2687:265b-45: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba mi byed pa'o //
T02D2687:265b-46: sems dang zhing zhes pa ni //
T02D2687:265b-47: dad pa rnams gsum las dang ba'i dad pa ste /
T02D2687:265b-48: bdag nyid kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i rnyog ma dang mi ldan pa'o //
T02D2687:265b-49: gtsang ma'i gos zhes pa ni sngags pas thang gos dkar la shin tu 'jam pa la /
T02D2687:265b-50: dus gsum du bkru ba dang /
T02D2687:265b-51: yang gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing sngags bzlas so //
T02D2687:266a-2: / de yang su siddhi ka ra las //
T02D2687:266a-3: sngags pas thang gos mi spang zhing //
T02D2687:266a-4: dkar la shin tu 'jam po de //
T02D2687:266a-5: nyin gcig bzhin du bsang bar bya //
T02D2687:266a-7: rab brgyan te zhes pa ni /
T02D2687:266a-8: sngags gos kyis sngags pa shin tu mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D2687:266a-9: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i cho ga'i sngon du bya ba bshad zin to /
T02D2687:266a-11: // / da ni sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi'i cho ga dngos bstan te /
T02D2687:266a-13: mtshan nyid mdor bsdus nas bstan du rung ba dang /
T02D2687:266a-14: gnyen po rnam par 'gal ba'i sgo nas spong pas na mdo sde'o //
T02D2687:266a-16: bskyed rim gsum ka bya bar 'thad pas na /
T02D2687:266a-18: yang na mtshan nyid kyi theg pa las mchog tu gyur pas na /
T02D2687:266a-20: ji ltar mchog tu gyur nas mtshan nyid kyi theg pas khrus dang gtsang sbra dang /
T02D2687:266a-21: dka' thub la sogs pa'i sgo nas dngos grub bsgrubs
T02D2687:266a-22: kyang tshe 'di la mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub la
T02D2687:266a-24: gzungs 'dis ni tshe 'di la mkha' spyod la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur bas na /
T02D2687:266a-26: mnyan par bya zhes pa ni ngag gi brjod bya rjod byed kyi tshig spangs te /
T02D2687:266a-27: bdag nyid kyi sems sgra spyi'i rnam par snang ba'o //
T02D2687:266a-29: sgrub pa po'i sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan byed pa de /
T02D2687:266a-30: tha mal pa'i so so'i skye bos mi rtogs pas na zab mo zhes pa'o //
T02D2687:266a-31: 'o na sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan te sus rtogs she na /
T02D2687:266a-32: sangs rgyas spyod yul pa zhes pa gsungs te /
T02D2687:266a-33: sangs rgyas nyag gcig kho na'i spyod yul yin pas des mkhyen to //
T02D2687:266a-34: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
T02D2687:266a-35: zhes pa ni sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan 'di byed na zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2687:266a-36: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid bshad zin to /
T02D2687:266a-38: // / da ni sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi phan yon bshad par bya ste /
T02D2687:266a-39: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2687:266a-40: zhes pa ni sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi phan yon gyis zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2687:266a-41: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2687:266a-42: zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i ris lnga'o //
T02D2687:266a-43: mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kun //
T02D2687:266b-0: zhes pa ni mdze'i nad la @266b sogs pa'o //
T02D2687:266b-1: de dag thams cad zhi bar blta //
T02D2687:266b-2: zhes pa ni mi bzad pa'i nad chen po las thar bar byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D2687:266b-4: zhes pa ni sngon gyi rnam par smin pa las tshe slar nur te ring por thub pa'o //
T02D2687:266b-5: dper na bcud len gyi sman sbyor lta bu'o /
T02D2687:266b-6: bsod nams 'phel par 'gyur zhes pa ni /
T02D2687:266b-7: bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2687:266b-8: dper na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
T02D2687:266b-9: la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2687:266b-14: kun chub par byed pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2687:266b-15: me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
T02D2687:266b-16: rim gro la sogs pa byas na /
T02D2687:266b-17: de dang de'i bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba lta bu'am /
T02D2687:266b-18: sa chen po la sa bon btab nas rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas /
T02D2687:266b-19: rnam par 'phel par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
T02D2687:266b-20: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar /
T02D2687:266b-21: zhes pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D2687:266b-22: yang na mi dge ba bcu dang /
T02D2687:266b-23: las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad spangs pa'o //
T02D2687:266b-24: dper na mi dge ba bcu spangs nas /
T02D2687:266b-25: dge ba bcu spyod pa'i gang zag lta bu'o //
T02D2687:266b-26: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya bar 'dod na /
T02D2687:266b-27: bsam gtan phyi ma las kyang /
T02D2687:266b-28: gsang sngags la gnas dngos grub ster //
T02D2687:266b-29: sgra gnas rnal 'byor ster bar dran //
T02D2687:266b-30: sgra mthar thar pa ster ba nyid //
T02D2687:266b-31: 'di dag de nyid gsum pa yin //
T02D2687:266b-33: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni //
T02D2687:266b-34: bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa mi dmigs par bsams la bde ba'i rjes la /
T02D2687:266b-35: bdag nyid kyi sems stong pa nyid kyi ngang las /
T02D2687:266b-36: nam mkha' las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na /
T02D2687:266b-37: gzungs sngags la sogs pa dkar sha re yod par bsams la /
T02D2687:266b-38: yi ge de'i 'od zer me 'bar ba lta bur bsams te /
T02D2687:266b-39: phyi nas de tshe yang mi dmigs par bsams le /
T02D2687:266b-40: bdag nyid kyi sems na mo ratna tra y'a ya bya ba nas /
T02D2687:266b-41: aa mri te h'um phat bya ba'i bar du yi
T02D2687:266b-42: ge'i rang sgra sgrogs pa de yang dper na dril
T02D2687:266b-43: bu'i sgra dang 'dra bar rgyun mi 'chad par bdag
T02D2687:266b-44: nyid kyi sems sgra spyi yi rnam par grag par
T02D2687:267a-1: / de ni sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan no //
T02D2687:267a-2: de mi byed na dmigs pa gsum gyis bya ba'am /
T02D2687:267a-5: sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol //
T02D2687:267a-6: gsang sngags yi ge bzhi la gnas //
T02D2687:267a-7: zhes bsam gtan phyi ma las gsungs so //
T02D2687:267a-8: gsang sngags kyi yi ge dang /
T02D2687:267a-9: de'i gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2687:267a-11: dang po ni gzugs la dmigs /
T02D2687:267a-12: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs /
T02D2687:267a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la dmigs so //
T02D2687:267a-15: bcom ldan 'das bum pa'i nang na bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2687:267a-16: bdag nyid lha ru bskyed pa dang /
T02D2687:267a-17: de gnyis kyi thugs ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re yod pa dang /
T02D2687:267a-18: de'i steng na gzungs rings sam /
T02D2687:267a-20: rigs kyi snying po gang rung gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2687:267a-21: 'o na lha ni gnyis su bshad la /
T02D2687:267a-23: zla ba gnyis gnyis su mi 'chad pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2687:267a-24: nang du bsdus tsam na gsum las med pas de ru yang 'dra gsung ngo //
T02D2687:267a-25: yang na gsang sngags dang bzlas pa gnyis ni rigs
T02D2687:267a-26: mi mthun par yang rnam par bcad pa'i ldog pa
T02D2687:267a-27: mtshungs la lha ni mi mtshungs pa yang srid pas
T02D2687:267a-28: na lha la gsum du bshad pa /
T02D2687:267a-29: sngags dang zla ba gnyis la rigs 'dra bas re rer ma bshad do //
T02D2687:267a-30: bzlas brjod byed pa'i zlos lugs ni gnyis te /
T02D2687:267a-32: shu bu'i sbyor bas ha cang mi dal mi myur
T02D2687:267a-33: bar sngags kyi yi ge brjod cing bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2687:267a-34: // de gnyis kyi grangs ni gtso 'khor yod na
T02D2687:267a-35: gtso bo la 'bum phrag gcig /'khor rnams la khri
T02D2687:267a-37: yi ge'i grangs kyis byed na /
T02D2687:267a-38: bco lnga man chad kyi yi ge re re zhing 'bum phrag re re bya'o //
T02D2687:267a-40: sum cu rtsa gnyis man chad la ni 'bum phrag gsum bya'o //
T02D2687:267a-41: de yan chad la ni 'bum phrag gsum bya'o gsung ngo //
T02D2687:267a-42: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa /
T02D2687:267a-43: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan la mchog tu brnyes pa //
T02D2687:267a-44: bsnyen pa'i dus su de bya'o //
T02D2687:267a-45: bum pa la byed na gcig bya'o //
T02D2687:267b-0: bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i bar du bzlas brjod byed pa ni gnyis ka'i shes par @267b bya'o ;
T02D2687:267b-1: / da ni sgrub pa'i cho ga bstan te /
T02D2687:267b-2: 'o na sgrub pa'i lugs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D2687:267b-3: ga dgos pa yin na bye brag gi rgyud 'di
T02D2687:267b-4: ru dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mi ston pa ci'i
T02D2687:267b-6: bum pa'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor la rag las pa yin pas /
T02D2687:267b-7: de bstan pas dkyil 'khor yang shugs kyis shes pa yin no //
T02D2687:267b-8: bum pa'i cho ga dkyil 'khor la rag las par ni dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las gsungs te /
T02D2687:267b-9: dkyil 'khor khor yug bum pa gzhag par bya //
T02D2687:267b-11: bum pa brgyad yod na bum pa sgo bzhi'i logs su gzhag pa dang /
T02D2687:267b-12: bcu gnyis yod na zur bzhir yang gzhag gsung ngo //
T02D2687:267b-13: gsang ba spyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D2687:267b-14: grva dang sgo ni ma lus par /
T02D2687:267b-15: bum pa dag kyang bzhag nas ni //
T02D2687:267b-16: bar sgo chen po gnyis gnyis shig / khyad par du ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2687:267b-17: bum pa gcig ni phyi sgo yi //
T02D2687:267b-18: drung du mngon par gzhag par bya //
T02D2687:267b-21: bum pa'i cho ga spyi rgyud du kha mi bskang pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2687:267b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang bri ba tsam du khyad med la /
T02D2687:267b-24: bum pa'i cho ga la ni bye brag yod pas /
T02D2687:267b-25: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i rdzas thun mong ma yin pa dgos te /
T02D2687:267b-29: me tog dmar po'i phreng ba rnams so //
T02D2687:267b-30: des na dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la ni khyad par med pas 'dir ma gsungs te /
T02D2687:267b-31: rdo rje rigs kyi spyi rgyud las shes par bya'o //
T02D2687:267b-32: bum pa'i cho ga la ni bye brag yod pas 'dir gsungs so //
T02D2687:267b-33: des na dkyil 'khor 'dir ma bstan pa la 'gal ba med do //
T02D2687:267b-34: da ni sgrub pa'i dub na bum pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2687:267b-35: bzlas brjod kyi grangs nges par khrus bya ba dang
T02D2687:267b-36: bcas pa bstan pa la gsum ste /
T02D2687:267b-37: bum pa rdzas dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D2687:267b-38: de la bzlas brjod ji ltar bya ba'i grangs bstan pa dang /
T02D2687:267b-39: gdul bya nye bar mtshon pa dang bcas par bstan pa'o //
T02D2687:267b-40: de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid bshad de /
T02D2687:267b-41: nor bu zhes pa ni spyi'i ming du smos te /
T02D2687:267b-42: bye brag du ma phyi ba dang /
T02D2687:267b-44: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'o //
T02D2687:268a-2: bum pa'i kha chod pa'i don du gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang ma'i nang du /
T02D2687:268a-3: yungs kar blugs pa'i snod gtsang ma 'jog pa'i don to //
T02D2687:268a-4: yungs kar de rnams kyang rdo rje rtse gcig par bsam pa'am /
T02D2687:268a-5: yang na khro bo re re bsam mo //
T02D2687:268a-6: d'ur ba zhes ba ni ma gul chings kyis bcings pa'i sna la mdud pa brgyab pa dang /
T02D2687:268a-7: ba'i lci bas rgyas btab pa'i tshul du glan la
T02D2687:268a-8: de'i steng du rtsva d'ur ba nyag ma bdun btsugs
T02D2687:268a-9: te / bgegs la sogs pa mi 'jug pa'i don du'o //
T02D2687:268a-12: nor bu rin po che dang /
T02D2687:268a-17: rma med ces pa ni gas chags med cing rgyan gyi bya ba byed nus pa'o //
T02D2687:268a-18: tsandan zhes pa ni dri lnga ste tsandan dang /
T02D2687:268a-22: gla rtsi yang bla ma na re gzhug gsung //
T02D2687:268a-24: srog chags yan lag 'byung mi shis //
T02D2687:268a-26: klu gnod na gla rtsi bcug na nus pa 'byung gsung ngo //
T02D2687:268a-45: chu'i snying po lan tshva dang /
T02D2687:268a-46: rtsi thog gi snying po mar dang /
T02D2687:268a-47: shing thog gi snying po bu ram dang /
T02D2687:268a-48: me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi'o //
T02D2687:268a-49: shel dang zhes pa ni dngos so //
T02D2687:268a-51: rin po che pha lam mo //
T02D2687:268a-52: de med na shel kun nas lci ma gzhog zur brgyad pa cig gzhug gsung ngo //
T02D2687:268a-53: me tog ces pa ni me tog dmar po dri
T02D2687:268a-54: zhim po la phreng ba byas la bum pa'i mgul
T02D2687:268a-56: chu yis zhes pa ni blangs pa'i chu gtsang ma srog chags med pas dgang ba'o //
T02D2687:268a-57: dri zhim po'i chu yang blug go //
T02D2687:268a-59: dngul gyi bum pa zhes pa ni bum pa'i rgyu bstan pa'o //
T02D2687:268a-60: tshad la sogs pa ni khrus kyi cho gar shes par bya'o //
T02D2687:268a-61: dag ces pa ni zangs la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D2687:268a-62: kyang zhes pa ni bsdu pa'i don to //
T02D2687:268b-0: dbul po rnams kyis @268b mi rnyed pas //
T02D2687:268b-1: rdza la sogs pa'i bum pa so btang ba'i nyes pa nag por ri med pa dang /
T02D2687:268b-2: dkyil 'khor gzhan du longs ma spyad pa la bya'o //
T02D2687:268b-3: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri shing zhes pa ni mgul pa dkri ba ste /
T02D2687:268b-4: ras kha tshar dang phun tshar ma nyams pa /
T02D2687:268b-5: gzhan du longs ma spyad pa /
T02D2687:268b-6: mi gtsang bas ma spags pa'i ras dkar po'o //
T02D2687:268b-8: 'di'i 'grel pa phyi ma las srog chags kyi rgyu
T02D2687:268b-9: las ma byung ba las gtsang ma zhes bya'o zhes
T02D2687:268b-10: bshad do // zhes pa ni rdzas de rnams kyi bum pa'i nang dag tu'o //
T02D2687:268b-12: rdzas dang mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D2687:268b-13: da ni sgrub pa'i dus kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'i grangs kyi tshad bstan pa ni /
T02D2687:268b-14: gzungs rings nyi shu rtsa gcig bya //
T02D2687:268b-16: rigs kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad zlos pas na /
T02D2687:268b-17: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02D2687:268b-18: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2687:268b-21: bum pa re re la grangs 'di tsam re re bya'o //
T02D2687:268b-22: des ni bzlas brjod bya ba bstan to //
T02D2687:268b-23: da ni gdul bya nye bar mtshon pa bstan te /
T02D2687:268b-24: rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas na ni //
T02D2687:268b-25: bzlas brjod byas pa'i 'og tu khrus kyi gang zag bstan pa'i don to //
T02D2687:268b-26: rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rigs bye brag tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2687:268b-29: nyin dang mtshan thams cad du'o //
T02D2687:268b-30: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni khrus bya ba'i gang zag mtshon pa tsam du zad de /
T02D2687:268b-31: rigs byin po gsum la yang bya'o //
T02D2687:268b-32: 'o na rigs bzhi ka la byed na /
T02D2687:268b-33: 'dir rgyal po gcig tu smos pa ci'i slad du zhe na /
T02D2687:268b-34: de ni gtso bo tsam smos pa yin te /
T02D2687:268b-35: de bden thams cad bde par 'gyur //
T02D2687:268b-36: de sdug bsngal na thams cad sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2687:268b-38: gtso bo tsam smos so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2687:268b-39: des ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i don ma lus par rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D2687:268b-40: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 'grel pa 'di byas pas //
T02D2687:268b-41: de ring bdag gis dge ba gang zhig thob 'gyur ba //
T02D2687:268b-42: zla 'od gsal dang mu tig do shal dri med dkar po 'dra ba des //
T02D2687:268b-43: nyon mongs mi shes sgrib pa'i glo bur gyur pa
T02D2687:268b-44: spang phyir sems can byang chub yid gyur cig /
T02D2687:269a-1: 'di ye shes rdo rjes smras pas sems can rnams kyis nyon /
T02D2687:269a-2: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i
T02D2687:269a-3: rim par phye ba rgya cher 'grel pa gsal ba'i
T02D2687:269a-4: sgron me zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo
T02D2687:269a-7: // / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis /
T02D2687:269a-8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po theg pa chen po gsang sngags la mkhas pa /
T02D2687:269a-9: slob dpon buddha gu hya dang /
T02D2687:269a-10: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ska
T02D2687:269a-11: ba dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
T02D2687:269a-13: slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po //
